level.text: The Director shall charge fees for business license categories with a Housing: Transient endorsement as follows:
With 11 or more units: $208, plus $45 per each additional 10 units or fraction thereof;
With 51 or more rooms: $619, plus $45 for each additional 10 rooms or fraction thereof;
Two or more kitchens: $190 per kitchen;
With 51 or more rooms: $411, plus $45 for each additional 10 rooms or fractions thereof;
With 26 or more rooms: $208, plus $45 for each additional 10 rooms or fractions thereof.

Source: Notice of Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 4654 (May 28, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Emergency Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 8792 (September 24, 2010)[EXPIRED]; as amended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 12191, 12194 (December 24, 2010).
